00031 namespace Hypertable {

00033   typedef boost::shared_array<const char> CharPtr;
00034 
00035   class TestData {
00036   public:
00037     bool load(const String &datadir) {
00038       struct stat statbuf;
00039       char *contentdata, *worddata, *urldata;
00040       char *base, *ptr, *last, *str;
00041       off_t len;
00042       String shakespearefile = datadir + "/shakespeare.txt";
00043       String shakespearegz = datadir + "/shakespeare.txt.gz";
00044       String wordsfile = datadir + "/words";
00045       String wordsgz = datadir + "/words.gz";
00046       String urlsfile = datadir + "/urls.txt";
00047       String urlsgz = datadir + "/urls.txt.gz";
00048       String syscmd;
00049 
00053       if (stat(shakespearefile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00054         if (stat(shakespearegz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00055           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file 'shakespeare.txt.gz' : %s",
00056                     strerror(errno));
00057           return false;
00058         }
00059         syscmd = "zcat " + shakespearegz + " > " + shakespearefile;
00060         if (system(syscmd.c_str())) {
00061           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", shakespearegz.c_str());
00062           return false;
00063         }
00064         if (stat(shakespearefile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00065           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", shakespearefile.c_str(),
00066                     strerror(errno));
00067           return false;
00068         }
00069       }
00070       if ((contentdata = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(shakespearefile.c_str(),
00071           &len)) == 0)
00072         return false;
00073       base = contentdata;
00074       while ((ptr = strstr(base, "\n\n")) != 0) {
00075         *ptr++ = 0;
00076         str = new char [strlen(base) + 1];
00077         strcpy(str, base);
00078         content.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00079         base = ptr + 2;
00080       }
00081 
00082       delete [] contentdata;
00083 
00087       if (stat(wordsfile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00088         if (stat(wordsgz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00089           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", wordsgz.c_str(),
00090                     strerror(errno));
00091           return false;
00092         }
00093         syscmd = "zcat " + wordsgz + " > " + wordsfile;
00094         if (system(syscmd.c_str())) {
00095           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", wordsgz.c_str());
00096           return false;
00097         }
00098         if (stat(wordsfile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00099           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", wordsfile.c_str(),
00100                     strerror(errno));
00101           return false;
00102         }
00103       }
00104       if ((worddata = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(wordsfile.c_str(), &len)) == 0)
00105         return false;
00106       base = strtok_r(worddata, "\n\r", &last);
00107       while (base) {
00108         str = new char [strlen(base) + 1];
00109         strcpy(str, base);
00110         words.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00111         base = strtok_r(0, "\n\r", &last);
00112       }
00113       delete [] worddata;
00114 
00115 
00119       if (stat(urlsfile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00120         if (stat(urlsgz.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00121           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file 'urls.txt.gz' : %s", strerror(errno));
00122           return false;
00123         }
00124         syscmd = "zcat " + urlsgz + " > " + urlsfile;
00125         if (system(syscmd.c_str())) {
00126           HT_ERRORF("Unable to decompress file '%s'", urlsgz.c_str());
00127           return false;
00128         }
00129         if (stat(urlsfile.c_str(), &statbuf) != 0) {
00130           HT_ERRORF("Unable to stat file '%s' : %s", urlsfile.c_str(),
00131                     strerror(errno));
00132           return false;
00133         }
00134       }
00135       if ((urldata = FileUtils::file_to_buffer(urlsfile.c_str(), &len)) == 0)
00136         return false;
00137       base = strtok_r(urldata, "\n\r", &last);
00138       while (base) {
00139         str = new char [strlen(base) + 1];
00140         strcpy(str, base);
00141         urls.push_back(CharPtr(str));
00142         base = strtok_r(0, "\n\r", &last);
00143       }
00144 
00145       return true;
00146     }
00147 
00148     std::vector<CharPtr> content;
00149     std::vector<CharPtr> words;
00150     std::vector<CharPtr> urls;
00151   };
